title: Fragment With Factory Marks, 1858
medium: Technique: roller-printed with color added by block on a cotton plain weave foundation.
inscribed:
"I & L SIMPSON FURNITURE PRINTERS SKINNER STREET LONDON" in frame, "Extra Cambric" in script. "MATCH SPRAY", "RED PURPLE OLIVE", "10", "2", and "1858, 31603, 28 in a tripartite frame. All of the above in black.
"HMN" twice, one in green, once in ocher.
description: Isolated polychrome sprays of flowers on a squiggle-filled background. Mark at one end, pattern at the other.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment With Factory Marks, 1858.
1858. Technique: roller-printed with color added by block on a cotton plain weave foundation.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-26.
